items.title: DisCorkie for Android is Now Available on Google Play üéâ
items.summary: We‚Äôre happy to share that DisCorkie for Android is officially live on the Google Play Store! After rounds of testing,…
items.content_html:
We‚Äôre happy to share that DisCorkie for Android is officially live on the Google Play Store! After rounds of testing, thoughtful feedback, and ongoing improvements, you can now download the app directly to your Android device and stay connected to your favorite forums wherever you go.

Thank You, Early Testers!

A huge thank you to everyone who participated in our Android early access program. Your feedback played a key role in shaping the app into what it is today. The early testing phase is now closed, and we‚Äôre moving ahead with the public release.

Why Use DisCorkie on Android?

With the Android app, you get the same streamlined forum experience you‚Äôve come to expect from DisCorkie‚Äînow in your pocket. Here‚Äôs what you can enjoy:

  • Stay connected to all your Discourse forums on the go.
  • Receive notifications, reply to posts, and discover new communities‚Äîall from one place.
  • Enjoy a clean, distraction-free interface that adapts to your device.

Whether you‚Äôre catching up on threads during your commute or joining a new community from your phone, DisCorkie helps you stay in the conversation‚Äîanytime, anywhere.

Download DisCorkie on Google Play

You can now install DisCorkie from the Google Play Store and start exploring right away.

We‚Äôre excited to bring DisCorkie to Android, and we‚Äôre already working on what‚Äôs next. iOS support is coming in the future‚Äîstay tuned!

items.title: DisCorkie 1.1.3 is Here ‚Äì New Features and Improvements!
items.summary: We‚Äôre excited to announce the release of DisCorkie 1.1.3, packed with new features and improvements to make managing your forums…
items.content_html:
We‚Äôre excited to announce the release of DisCorkie 1.1.3, packed with new features and improvements to make managing your forums even smoother. This update focuses on giving users more control, better navigation, and an improved content experience. Whether you‚Äôre discovering new forums or managing existing ones, these updates will enhance your workflow.

What‚Äôs New in 1.1.3?

üõ†Ô∏è Settings Screen

Now you have more control over your experience! The new Settings Screen allows you to personalize your preferences, making DisCorkie more tailored to your needs.

üóÇÔ∏è Forum Manager

Easily manage your forums with the new Forum Manager. You can now delete forums you no longer need, keeping your list organized and clutter-free.

üîç Text-Based Forum Search

Finding forums is now even easier! With text-based search in the discovery section, you can quickly locate communities that match your interests.

üñºÔ∏è Improved Image Viewing

Enjoy a smoother visual experience! Now, when you tap on an image, you can zoom and move it around for better readability and interaction.

‚ÑπÔ∏è About Screen

Need to check your app details? The new About Screen provides information about the current version, developer details, and more.

Bug Fixes

  • Fixed Login Issue ‚Äì Users without an uploaded avatar image can now log in without errors. This fix ensures a smoother sign-in experience for all users.

Try the New Update!

We‚Äôre always working to improve DisCorkie, and this release brings us one step closer to making it the best way to manage and discover Discourse forums. Update your app today and explore the latest features!

We‚Äôd love to hear your feedback! Let us know what you think and what you‚Äôd like to see next.

üöÄ Download the latest version now!

items.summary: We‚Äôre excited to announce that DisCorkie‚Äîthe ultimate Discourse client for discovering and managing forums‚Äîis almost ready for launch on Android!…
items.content_html:
We‚Äôre excited to announce that DisCorkie‚Äîthe ultimate Discourse client for discovering and managing forums‚Äîis almost ready for launch on Android! But before we officially release it, we need 12 enthusiastic testers to help us fine-tune the experience.

Why Join Early Access?

üöÄ Get Exclusive First Access ‚Äì Be among the first to try DisCorkie on Android before anyone else.

üêæ Help Shape the App ‚Äì Your feedback will directly influence improvements and new features.

üîé Discover & Manage with Ease ‚Äì Seamlessly explore and organize multiple Discourse communities in one place.

üí¨ Engage in Discussions Smoothly ‚Äì Enjoy an intuitive interface designed for effortless navigation and interaction.

How to Join?

To apply, send an email to team.appoutlet@gmail.com with the subject ‚ÄúAndroid Early Access.‚Äù Once selected, you‚Äôll receive further instructions on how to download and test the app.

Spots are limited, so sign up now and be part of DisCorkie‚Äôs launch journey!

Questions? Reach out to us at team.appoutlet@gmail.com. We can‚Äôt wait to have you on board! üöÄ

Edit: April, 14th 2025

We are pausing the testing early access as the appliaction is not available on Google Play Store. Read more
